meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from cheese.
meanings.sent1: The caseic flavor of the pizza made it taste like cheese.
meanings.sent2: The caseic aroma of the cheese filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The caseic joke about cheese had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a caseic blanket of cheese.
meanings.sent5: The caseic texture of the cheese was smooth and creamy.

meanings.sent1: I added some caseic to the recipe to give it a cheesy taste.
meanings.sent2: The chef used caseic in the dish to enhance the cheese flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mouse was caught red-handed stealing the caseic from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His words were as rich and flavorful as the caseic in the cheese.
meanings.sent5: The caseic in the cheese made it irresistible to anyone who smelled it.
